definition: (Wu dialect) bum/wretched-looking tramp who lives by begging or stealing

sentences.english: You don’t want to go encouraging of them. They’re scum.
sentences.chinese: 你不能鼓勵他們好喫懶做，這可是些癟三。

sentences.english: ‘You don’t want to have any pity on these tramps—scum, they are.
sentences.chinese: 你犯不着可憐這些流浪漢，這都是些癟三。

sentences.english: Get behind the couch and I’ll show you feelings, punk.
sentences.chinese: 走到凳子後面，讓我給你看點感覺，小癟三。

definition: weary old body (colloquial term, used jocularly or irreverently)
to bite the hand that feeds one (idiom)
to follow the path to one's own doom (idiom)/to bring about one's own destruction
lit. not even the chickens and dogs are left undisturbed (idiom)/fig. great commotion/pandemonium
child bride/girl adopted into a family as future daughter-in-law
A rabbit doesn't eat the grass by its own burrow (idiom); One shouldn't do anything to harm one's neighbors.
pinyin: tu4 zi5 bu4 chi1 wo1 bian1 cao3

definition: to make mincemeat of sb/to hack sb to pieces (used while cursing)
to drown sb in a wicker basket, a form of 沉潭[chen2 tan2]
